content.text: 0) Mix oats, flour, sugar and coconut together.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "oats"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "flour"@13:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "sugar"@20:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "coconut"@30:37 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a small saucepan over low heat, melt the syrup and butter together.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "melt"@38:42 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a small saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "low heat"@28:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the syrup"@43:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "butter"@57:63 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Mix the soda and the boiling water and add to the melted butter and syrup.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "the soda"@7:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "the boiling water"@20:37 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "add"@42:45 / AC
		:ppt ( "the melted butter"@49:66 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "syrup"@71:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add butter mixture to the dry ingredients.
4) Drop by teaspoons on greased cookie sheets (or baking paper).
5) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes.
